Insight is perfect for your niche template for advisor, agent, consulting firm, financial adviser, financial consulting, banking, business template. Insight Website Templates have the power to help you represent your company professional and expert in your service.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Its 100% Bootstrap Responsive, Clean and Business Template. Template has Four Home pages. twelve Different Type of Service, Pages like..Service Page, Case Study, Advisor, About us, Fee scheduled, Appointment form \u0026amp;#38; Contact us, Financial Info, Annual Report, Quarterly Report, FAQ pages etc.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__item-description\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Our theme include all features that you need\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Work on WordPress 4.5+\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2 Completly different design\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Visual Composer Drop \u0026amp;#38; Drag page buider with 29+ custom web element for create unlimited layouts and pages.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Revolution Slider for create unlimited sliders\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Import demo content with just one click\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Full demo content include\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Powerfull Theme Options with Reduxframework\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Unlimited Color Styles. Love to remind you that Lapin Blanc is created by an Elite Author of ThemeForest market, our codes are clean, secure and SEO friendly. Your visual content will only get bigger because it has been growing for years and appears to be speeding up. Your audiences love to share your content with the world via their social media like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest. It\u0026amp;#8217;s awesome, huh?\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://zooka.io/tf/lapinblanc/description.jpg\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__overall-features\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Overall Features\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Blazing fast loading speed\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Two post layout options: Full width, Content-Sidebar\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Two blog options: Modern Blog Layout \u0026amp;#38; Classic Blog Layout\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;One-click sample data\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Live Customizer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Unlimited colors\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;RTL support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsive \u0026amp;#38; Retina\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Sticky header\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;600+ Google fonts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;WPML supported \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Font Awesome icons\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Bootstrap 3.x based\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Smooth CSS3 animation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contact Form 7, Envato WordPress Toolkit, and Widget Logic supported\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Cross browsers compatibility: Chrome, Firefox, IE11 and Safari. \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Note\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;: \u0026lt;i\u0026gt;All images are just used for Preview Purpose Only. id\u003d\"item-description__template-features\"\u0026gt;Template Features\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;HTML5 and CSS3\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nBootstrap 3\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nGrid System and Responsive Design\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n2 Different Header Styles\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n2  Blog Pages (Not Functional)\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n2 Single Pages (Not Functional)\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nLogin/Register Pages and Headers (Not Functional)\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nSEO Optimized\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nGoogle Fonts Support\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nOwl Carousel\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nCustom Portfolio \u0026amp;#38; portfolio item\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n+ 24 Custom Pages\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nMouse Hover Prepared \r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nSupport font Awesome \u0026amp;#38; Glyphicons fonts icons\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\njQuery Enhanced\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nNeat and Clean\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nCross Browser Support\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nAll Files are Well Commented\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nAnd More \u0026lt;sup\u0026gt;_\u0026lt;/sup\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__template-pages\"\u0026gt;Template Pages\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;index.html\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nshared-hosting.html\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\ndedicated-hosting.html\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThe premium plugin, Total Donations, is included so you can benefit from all the options offered, including four methods of payments and a bunch of cool features.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nWe also included the Visual Composer with 12 extra sections, so you can easily create pages in no time.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nAnd off course, the Revolution Slider, to create eye catching slides for your visitors.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://futurethemes.ticksy.com/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img section can be used in any page\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Revolution Slider\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Total Donation Plugin\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;MailChimp  Subscribe form\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contact Form 7\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;FontAwesome PILLAR, A VERSATILE MULTI-PURPOSE WORDPRESS THEME FOR MODERN STARTUPS.\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Includes over 110 pre-built, ready to use demo pages and over 160 sections for multi-page or one page WordPress websites and landing pages. Convert visitors with SEO-friendly markup. Pillar is based on Bootstrap, the ubiquitous responsive website framework, so you\u0026amp;#8217;ll feel right at home using a familiar grid structure to create everything from corporate sites and business landing pages to personal resume and masonry portfolio sites with buttery-smooth parallax effects.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;With full colour control and 1 click colour options you can create a website for your brand in seconds, or for instant pages use Visual Composer to whip up layouts and prototype designs for clients in record time with absolute ease. Visual Composer is the worlds most popular plugin for page building in WordPress and we\u0026amp;#8217;re proud to include it for you, FREE!\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a id\u003d\"item-description__meet-pillar-your-ultimate-design-toolkit\"\u0026gt;Meet Pillar. Your Ultimate Design Toolkit\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n    Pillar is an expansive, carefully crafted collection of stylish pages and content blocks. Featuring over 100 styled, ready to use demo pages and over 130 unique content blocks, Pillar empowers you to build visually beautiful pages powered by semantically beautiful markup. With extensive styling for portfolios, blogs, shops and landings \u0026amp;#8211; Pillar comfortably suits all common website styles. \r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__fast-intuitive-page-building-with-visual-composer\"\u0026gt;Fast, intuitive page building with Visual Composer\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n    What you see is \u0026lt;em\u0026gt;exactly\u0026lt;/em\u0026gt; what you get\u0026amp;#8230; Build in real-time using a vast array of meticulously designed blocks in Visual Composer, the most popular page builder for WordPress.  Quickly mock up ideas and experiment with \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;layouts in real-time\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;, then enjoy your page \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;no junk code and no inline style\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;.  Save your nav and footer to assemble your whole site in seconds \u0026amp;#8211; just apply the same nav and footer to each page, or, switch it up on a per page basis.  Build one-page sites by easily linking your nav items to sections on the page!  \r\n    \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Smooth parallax\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; is just one click away \u0026amp;#8211; switch parallax on in any section that has an image background.\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n    Goodbye, Scrolljank! We\u0026amp;#8217;ve gone to great lengths to improve cross-platform user experience, developing an in-house scrolling plugin that integrates hardware accelerated parallax.  Developed using all available browsers on both Windows and OSX, we\u0026amp;#8217;ve achieved smooth scrolling on trackpads and mouse wheels that feels natural and unobtrusive.  It\u0026amp;#8217;s so good you won\u0026amp;#8217;t notice it\u0026amp;#8217;s there.\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__pillar-multipurpose-wordpress-theme-features\"\u0026gt;Pillar Multipurpose WordPress Theme Features\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Latest WordPress Version \u0026lt;b\u0026gt;always\u0026lt;/b\u0026gt; supported, currently 4.5+\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fantastic, 5 star rated support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Infinite page layout possibilities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Hundreds of custom elements, blog feeds, portfolio feeds etc.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Simple, 1-Click color options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Beautifully organised, powerful theme options panel\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;WordPress Live Customizer based theme options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Hundreds of theme options available\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Developer friendly code\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;SEO optimised design\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fully responsive, beautiful design with an emphasis on readability\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Visual Composer Included, Free\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Masonry layouts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Owl Carousel elements\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Multiple header options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Multiple footer options\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Change header and footer on a per page basis\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Single page, one page site capabilities\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Google fonts compatibility\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Ready for WooCommerce \u0026amp;#38; Tickera\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Works with Contact Form 7 \u0026amp;#38; Gravity Forms\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Sharp and professional retina image integrations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Adaptive images\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsive, powerful grid system\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Social Icon Ready\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Modular, Extensive headers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Social Sharing ready\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Handpicked, beautiful vector icons\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Pixel perfect design\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Nearly 2 hours of custom video documentation\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Online written documentation, ready to get you started right away\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Speedy support with average response times of less than 6 hours\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Build multi-page sites and one-page sites\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;20+ Uniquely designed and styled home pages\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;130+ Blocks \u0026amp;#38; Options in Visual Composer Page Builder\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Boxed or wide layouts via a single option\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Square or Round\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; buttons via a single option\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Over 2000 icons to choose from including the premium \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Icons Mind\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; icon kit \u0026amp;#8211; worth $59\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Multi-column \u0026amp;#8220;mega-menu\u0026amp;#8221; and double-level drop-down menus\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Traditional nav bar and \u0026amp;#8216;offscreen\u0026amp;#8217; nav types \u0026amp;#8211; all responsive for mobile users\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;  \r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Modals to support forms, iframes or any HTML\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Auto-load and delay-load modal functions with cookie supported dismiss\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;In-house developed, purpose-built, ultra-smooth hardware-accelerated, \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;cross-platform smooth parallax and scroll handling\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; script\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;    \r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Visual Composer Page Builder included \u0026amp;#8211; you save $34\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Owl Carousel included \u0026amp;#8211; with flexible data attribute modifiers\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Based on Bootstrap 3.3.5 \u0026amp;#8211; all common elements are styled\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;    \r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Twitter feed integration\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fully realised \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;shop layouts\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt; \r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Full \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;blog layouts\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; with sidebars\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Youtube video section backgrounds\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Google Maps API enabled\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; maps with retina map markers added via simple data attributes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Custom Youtube and Vimeo embed modals\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Custom \u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Isotope filterable portfolio\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; Sections\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lightbox Gallery\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Widgetised menu and footer structure for maximum flexibility\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Dev-friendly \u0026amp;#8211; Atomic design means developers know what to expect when customising markup\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://tommusrhodus.ticksy.com/articles/100004468/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;Fully documented with online docs pages\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; covering all elements in-browser\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Dedicated \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://tommusrhodus.ticksy.com/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;support forum\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;FREE updates to come!  Tell us what you\u0026amp;#8217;d like to see via Twitter \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://twitter.com/tommusrhodus\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;@tommusrhodus\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__simple-amp-speedy-admin\"\u0026gt;Simple \u0026amp;#38; Speedy Admin\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;All appropriate functions and post types from our Ebor Framework plugin\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;No nasty admin changes\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Quick and simple page building with Visual Composer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Speedy and intuitive mega menu building\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Adaptive images\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Pre-built pages and simple import page templates\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;1 Click demo data import\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Automated plugin install for simple startup\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;WPML ready and certified\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Native WordPress features used for all functionality\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\t\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;No surprises! Everything feels just like a regular WordPress theme\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\t\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n \r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__some-deathtothestockphoto-com-images-cannot-be-supplied-in-download-package-and\"\u0026gt;Some \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://www.deathtothestockphoto.com/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;deathtothestockphoto.com\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; images cannot be supplied in download package, and have been heavily blurred for licensing reasons.  Free and original images (such as those sourced from \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://www.unsplash.com\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;unsplash.com\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;) are included in original form.\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h4 id\u003d\"item-description__changelog\"\u0026gt;Changelog\u0026lt;/h4\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;code\u0026gt;\r\n\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\u003d\r\nv 1.0 - SEPTEMBER 2016\r\n-------------------------------------------------------------------\r\nInitial Release\r\n\u0026lt;/code\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003etommusrhodus\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-09-07T03:19:43+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T22:28:49+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-09-07T03:19:43+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eMarble - Modern Magazine (Entertainment)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://themeforest.net/item/marble-modern-magazine/17549673\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eMontaukCo\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eMontaukCo\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:themeforest.net,2007-12-31:Item/17549673\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Marble\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; is a modern magazine template, that can give your readers a more dynamic experience. Marble polished \u0026amp;#38; beautifully balanced landing page make it an ideal template for almost anything. \u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;SELLING ALL RIGHTS on this template, also you can book our next PSD \u0026amp;#8211; contact via email: \u0026lt;a href\u003d\"mailto:lilia.gladkaya@yandex.com\"\u0026gt;lilia.gladkaya@yandex.com\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt; \u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt; \r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__features\"\u0026gt;Features\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Polished inner pages\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Professional Post Formats\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Balanced Grid System\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Easy to Customize\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Eye-catching Typography\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;    \r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt; \r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__fonts\"\u0026gt;Fonts\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Lato\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt; \r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;h2 id\u003d\"item-description__graphics\"\u0026gt;Graphics\u0026lt;/h2\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n      \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Adobe Stock\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n        \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;All Images are not included\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eMontaukCo\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-08-21T01:09:23+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T16:12:05+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-08-21T01:09:23+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eKhaleesi - Interior Design Agency - PSD template (Creative)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://themeforest.net/item/khaleesi-interior-design-agency-psd-template/17298888\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003ecreativemonkie\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003ecreativemonkie\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:themeforest.net,2007-12-31:Item/17298888\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Khaleesi is a new PSD template which can be used when building the website for your interior design business.\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nIt contains 5 PSD files:\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;01 \u0026amp;#8211; 404 error page\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__credits-amp-resources-used-in-this-template\"\u0026gt;Credits \u0026amp;#38; Resources used in this template\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\r\nFonts:\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Rubik\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Rubik\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.fontyukle.net/en/SignPainter-HouseScript.ttf\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;https://www.fontyukle.net/en/SignPainter-HouseScript.ttf\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\r\nIcons:\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.iconfinder.com\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;https://www.iconfinder.com\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"http://fontawesome.io/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;http://fontawesome.io/\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\r\nImages:\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.pexels.com/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;https://www.pexels.com/\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Inportant: All the photos that appear in the preview files are for display use only and are not included in the PSD files.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003ecreativemonkie\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-07-29T21:17:48+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T15:23:39+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-07-29T21:17:48+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eNella - News \u0026amp; Magazine Mobile Template (Mobile)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://themeforest.net/item/nella-news-magazine-mobile-template/17545683\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eXioyuna\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eXioyuna\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:themeforest.net,2007-12-31:Item/17545683\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;This is a clean and minimal HTML5 mobile template that will help you create a mobile website or native app using solutions like Phonegap or Cordova.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Nella is the perfect template that you need if you have a blog and you want to create a News \u0026amp;#38; Magazine mobile web app or native app.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;The template is responsive and it contains media queries to perfectly ajust the layout for each device. So the design is not approximative, it is precise and optimized.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Note : This template includes navigation and transitions between pages. Ajax calls are currently used to move between the different pages, so you need to run this template on a web server to make the navigation work properly. (This is not needed when deploying for PhoneGap/Cordova). However, you can use your own method for the navigation (eg normal links).\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://rapimpact.fr/NellaTemplate/img/top.png\" /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://rapimpact.fr/NellaTemplate/img/middle.gif\" /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://rapimpact.fr/NellaTemplate/img/bottom.png\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eXioyuna\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-08-20T09:53:08+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T17:12:40+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-08-20T09:53:08+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eAmour - There are 5 homepages (from classic to creative style), lots of feature pages (about, blog, shop, product details, check-out, cart, etc.). Each page also has different styles to indulge you.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;With clean, minimal and elegant design, Florist promises to make your products blossom in front of visitors\u0026amp;#8217; eyes.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://img.beautheme.com/amour/feature.jpg\" sidebar \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 2 type About \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Woocommerce \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Quick view woocommerce \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eBeautheme\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-05-07T07:12:12+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T20:09:45+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-05-07T07:12:12+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003e1992 - Freestyle WordPress Theme - Modern WooCommerce Store (WooCommerce)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eBeautheme\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eBeautheme\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:themeforest.net,2007-12-31:Item/16085161\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;table\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;tr\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;td\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.facebook.com/beautheme\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://img.beautheme.com/w-facebook.jpg\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/td\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;td\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://www.behance.net/Beautheme\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://img.beautheme.com/w-behance.jpg\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/td\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;td\u0026gt;\u0026lt;a href\u003d\"https://dribbble.com/beautheme\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://img.beautheme.com/w-twitter.jpg\" /\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/td\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/tr\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/table\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Our 1992 is a WooCommerce WordPress theme which focuses on online shop for kids. Although this theme is for Kids, their parents are the main shopper. So 1992\u0026amp;#8217;s design is not like a kindergarten, we just make it more adorable with hover effect on buttons in the main white and black color of the theme. Therefore, the theme is for kids, but still clean and elegant.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Besides, you can use 1992 blog to share your experience about fashion or your upcoming amazing product. And make your site more charming with the asymmetrical layout and different awesome headers.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;As you know, 1992 is a WooCommerce theme, so it has full functions of an online shop, such as: cart, check out, wishlist\u0026amp;#8230; Furthermore, no matter where are you living, you still can use this theme by translating it into your mother language with only a language file.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Take it, and make all kids and their parents satisfy!\r\nIf you love our theme, please rate us \u0026lt;b\u0026gt;*\u0026lt;/b\u0026gt;, we will try support you the best.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;img src\u003d\"http://img.beautheme.com/1992/feature.jpg\" /\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 5  home page layout \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 9 header style \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 9 footer style \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 2 style category blog, 2 style single blog \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Woocommerce (quickview, add to cart) \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 2 styles category Product, 2 styles single Product \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; 4 style lookbook and 1 lookbook slider \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; feature post in sidebar \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Instagram gallery widget\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Subcribe mailchimp \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Contact form 7 (form builder) with google map \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;600+ Google fonts \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Translation ready \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Demo content include \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Font awesome \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Contact with google map \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Build with sass \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Import export customization option \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Validate w3c \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Document included \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt; Redux Option \u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__key-features\"\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Key Features\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eBeautheme\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-05-07T06:45:54+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T14:58:35+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-05-07T06:45:54+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003centry\u003e\u003ctitle type\u003d\"text\"\u003eTinker - Car Repair and eCommerce PSD (Retail)\u003c/title\u003e\u003clink rel\u003d\"alternate\" type\u003d\"text/html\" href\u003d\"https://themeforest.net/item/tinker-car-repair-and-ecommerce-psd/17431418\" /\u003e\u003cauthor\u003e\u003cname\u003eDevItems\u003c/name\u003e\u003cemail\u003eDevItems\u003c/email\u003e\u003c/author\u003e\u003cid\u003etag:themeforest.net,2007-12-31:Item/17431418\u003c/id\u003e\u003ccontent type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Tinker \u0026amp;#8211; type\u003d\"html\" xml:space\u003d\"preserve\"\u003e\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__about-mistral\"\u0026gt;About Mistral\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Mistral is a modern premium template created for companies, but thanks to the wide customizatios, it is adaptable to multiple purposes.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThis theme has been thought minding the simplicity of utilization and directness and it is the reason why it comes with a personal framework.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nThanks to Mistral personal settings you will be able to customize your theme without touching not even a single code line with no need to study long documentation through drag \u0026amp;#38; drop and the several explanations it includes.\u0026lt;br /\u0026gt;\r\nMistral is responsive and developed according to web standard that makes it compatible with all major devices and browsers. \u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\r\n\r\n\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;h3 id\u003d\"item-description__features\"\u0026gt;Features\u0026lt;/h3\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Responsive \u0026amp;#38; Mobile Ready\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Infinite color combinations\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Font customization\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Entypo Icons Support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Icons support in navigation menu\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Custom Menu position and attachment\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Simple \u0026amp;#38; Beauty slider\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Fully customizable homepage sections with multiple layouts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Full width page template\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Full width contact page with map\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Background images for pages header\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Portfolio with 4 layouts for items\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Team Members and Testimonials management\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;2 Blog layouts\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Up to 4 widgets in footer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Social links support\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;One click demo importer\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Translation ready, .pot file included\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;WooCommerce ready\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\r\n    \u0026lt;li\u0026gt;And href\u003d\"http://www.nebulosaweb.com/themeforest/mistral/doc/\" rel\u003d\"nofollow\"\u0026gt;our documentation\u0026lt;/a\u0026gt;.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\u003c/content\u003e\u003cdc:creator\u003eNebulaWP\u003c/dc:creator\u003e\u003cdc:date\u003e2016-04-19T02:20:22+10:00\u003c/dc:date\u003e\u003cupdated\u003e2016-09-08T23:05:08+10:00\u003c/updated\u003e\u003cpublished\u003e2016-04-19T02:20:22+10:00\u003c/published\u003e\u003c/entry\u003e\u003c/feed\u003e\r\n","feed":{"feedUrl":"http://themeforest.net/feeds/new-themeforest-items.atom","title":"ThemeForest Featuring over 100 styled, ready to use demo pages and over 130 unique content blocks, Pillar empowers you to build visually beautiful pages powered by semantically beautiful markup. With extensive styling for portfolios, blogs, shops and landings – Pillar comfortably suits all common website styles. \n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch4\u003eFast, intuitive page building with Visual Composer\u003c/h4\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\n    What you see is \u003cem\u003eexactly\u003c/em\u003e what you get… Build in real-time using a vast array of meticulously designed blocks in Visual Composer, the most popular page builder for WordPress. Save your nav and footer to assemble your whole site in seconds – just apply the same nav and footer to each page, or, switch it up on a per page basis.  Build one-page sites by easily linking your nav items to sections on the page!  \n    \u003cstrong\u003eSmooth parallax\u003c/strong\u003e is just one click away – switch parallax on in any section that has an image background.\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\n    Goodbye, Scrolljank! We’ve gone to great lengths to improve cross-platform user experience, developing an in-house scrolling plugin that integrates hardware accelerated parallax.  Developed using all available browsers on both Windows and OSX, we’ve achieved smooth scrolling on trackpads and mouse wheels that feels natural and unobtrusive.
